Uses of Class
WHG.Block

    • Uses of Block in WHG

      Subclasses of Block in WHG 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AnimatedBlock
      This class is an extension of block and implements the Renderable interface and is used to draw the blocks in the background that change color.
      class  Ball
      This class is used to draw and update the blue balls in the game.
      class  Coin
      This class is used to draw and update the yellow coins in the game.
      class  Square
      This class is used to draw and update the red square in the game.
      class  Wall
      This class is used to draw the walls on the screen.
      Methods in WHG with parameters of type Block 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean Block.checkCollision(Block block)
      This boolean will return true or false based on if a collision is happening.
      void AnimatedBlock.onCollision(Block block)
      This method does nothing but must be added as this class is an extension of the block class.
      void Ball.onCollision(Block block)
      This is used to check for collisions between other blocks and set the speed to its opposite speed accordingly if a collision is detected.
      abstract void Block.onCollision(Block block)
      This abstract method will be used by the blocks to see if a block is colliding with another block.
      void Coin.onCollision(Block block)
      This method does nothing but must be added as this class is an extension of the block class.
      void Square.onCollision(Block block)
      This method checks to see if the square is colliding with anything.
      void Wall.onCollision(Block block)
      This method does nothing but must be added as this class is an extension of the block class.
